name: VIEW_QUIZ
description: Allows users to view quiz and details

name: CREATE_ROLES
description: Users can roles with custom permissions

name: PUBLISH_QUIZ
description: Users can publish the quiz that was created

name: UNPUBLISH_QUIZ
description: Users can Un-publish the quiz that was created

name: SEE_ADMIN_KEY_METRICS
description: Users cannot see critical admin key metrics data

name: CREATE_PERMISSION
description: Allows users to create new permission
